snippet: Brazil’s Neymar scored the equalizer, but in the 81st, on a penalty kick, he missed so badly the ball would have soared over two goals stacked up.
lead_paragraph: Brazil’s Neymar scored the equalizer, but in the 81st, on a penalty kick, he missed so badly the ball would have soared over two goals stacked up.

headline.seo: Brazil Ties Colombia as Neymar Misses Penalty Kick
headline.main: Result Is Tie, but Brazil and Colombia Stay on Attack
headline.print_headline: Result Is Tie, but Brazil and Colombia Stay on Attack
